name: Concord Foods Organic Guacamole Mix Just Add Avocados for Perfect Homemade Guacamole Dip Ideal for Parties, BBQs & Taco Nights Pure Taste for Guacamole Seasoning - 0.8 Ounce Pouches (6 Pouches Total)
short_description: Quick & Easy Guacamole: Make fresh guacamole in minutes with our organic guacamole mix. Just add two ripe avocados for a delicious guacamole dip that's perfect for parties, BBQs, or taco nights.

Pure & Organic Ingredients: Our guacamole seasoning mix is made with organic ingredients including garlic powder, red bell pepper, jalapeno powder, and parsley flakes. Enjoy a fresh and natural guacamole taste every time.

Healthy & Nutritious: Avocados are packed with vitamins and healthy fats. Combine them with our organic guacamole seasoning for a nutritious snack that's great for any occasion, whether it's a family dinner or a casual gathering.

Versatile & Flavorful: Use our guacamole mix to create more than just guacamole dip. Spread it on toast, add it to sandwiches, or serve it as a side with tortilla chips. It’s a versatile addition to your kitchen.

Perfect for All Events: Whether you’re hosting a big party, a BBQ, or a cozy taco night, our guacamole mix ensures you have fresh guacamole ready to impress your guests. Enjoy the convenience and pure taste of homemade guacamole.
product_description: With our Concord Foods Organic Guacamole Mix, you can make the freshest and tastiest guacamole in minutes. Just combine two ripe avocados with one package of our guacamole mix, and you'll have a delicious dip ready to serve with tortilla chips, as a topping for tacos, or as a side to your favorite recipe. Our mix includes organic ingredients like maltodextrin, salt, nonfat dry milk, dehydrated onion, garlic powder, red bell pepper, lime juice powder, jalapeno powder, and parsley flakes. Enjoy the pure, natural taste of guacamole with the convenience of a ready to use mix. Perfect for parties, BBQs, and taco nights, Our Guacamole Mix makes it easy to impress your guests with a fresh and flavorful dip. Whether you're making guacamole for a gathering or simply enjoying it as a healthy snack, our mix ensures you get the best taste every time. Plus, the organic ingredients shows that you're serving something wholesome and natural. Experience the fresh success of homemade guacamole with the perfect blend of seasonings in every packet. Enjoy the authentic flavor and make every occasion special with our organic guacamole mix.

name: HERDEZ® Salsa Dipping Variety 3 Pack – NEW! Chunky Medium, Salsa Con Queso, Avocado Dip Medium – Authentic Mexican Flavor Dips for Chips
short_description: Contains (1) HERDEZ Chunky Salsa, Medium: Made with a flavorful blend of green chiles, jalapeño, and serrano peppers, HERDEZ Chunky Salsa brings a touch of Mexico straight to your home.
Contains (1) HERDEZ Avocado Dip, Medium: Made with real avocados, this creamy dip brings the traditions and flavors of Mexico alive on chips, veggies, and more.

Contains (1) HERDEZ Salsa Con Queso, Medium: Dip into smooth, rich flavor and endless possibilities from game day gatherings to taco night. Savor the real cheese flavor with a kick for a snack or fiesta whenever the mood strikes! Contains milk.
product_description: Dip into the flavors of Mexico with the HERDEZ® Dipping Variety 3 Pack, featuring the NEW HERDEZ® Chunky Salsa. HERDEZ® Salsa is the No. 1 salsa brand in Mexico, and this vibrant dipping variety pack brings the bold flavors of Mexico to your front door. Just open, dip, and enjoy! CHUNKY SALSA - MEDIUM Get ready to spice up your life with our all-new HERDEZ® Chunky Salsa. Crafted with care in the heart of Mexico, this flavorful salsa is here to transform your experience – whether dipping with chips, topping tacos or enhancing recipes. HERDEZ® Chunky Salsa brings a touch of Mexico straight to your home. SALSA CON QUESO - MEDIUM HERDEZ® Salsa Con Queso Dip delivers bold, authentic flavor in a creamy cheese dip with just the right amount of heat. This salsa queso is perfect for dipping chips or topping a variety of Mexican dishes. AVOCADO DIP – MEDIUM Dip into the world of bold and rich flavors with HERDEZ® Avocado Dip. Made with real avocados and a bit of a kick, this creamy dip will take your veggies and chips to next level snacking.

name: Sabra Spicy Guacamole Dip Cups for On the Go Snacks & Lunches, 2 Oz Singles (Pack of 4) - Made with Real Hass Avocado - Non-GMO, Dairy-Free, Vegan, Vegetarian, Kosher & Gluten-Free
short_description: Sabra Singles Spicy Guacamole: For those who dare, we’ve added a little fiery flavor to our chunky, classic guacamole. Featuring hot jalapenos, it’s a simple way to spice up snack time. Now in convenient on-the-go portions bringing the delicious guac you love. Size: 4-pack of 2 oz mini cups.

Guac That Hass It All: Made with deliciously spicy jalapeno peppers, lime juice concentrate, and Mexican-grown Hass avocados, this little hottie will wake up your taste buds and then some. What’s not to love?
Nourishing the Soul: Sabra is committed to uniting and delighting the world around planet-positive food. That's why we responsibly source all of our real Hass avocados from Mexico.
Fresh-Tasting, Feel Good Food: We evaluate every single ingredient we use so you can feel good about snacking. Spicy Guac is non-GMO, dairy-free, vegan, vegetarian, kosher & gluten-free.

The Sabra Promise: Our goal is to spread joy through the irresistible bounty of vibrant food inspired by the Mediterranean. We are always on a journey to discover, to be true to ourselves, and to draw people together with rich, immersive and fun experiences.

short_description: Creamy mild guacamole made with fresh avocados from an authentic Mexican recipe. Pair with meat dishes or make it your go-to dip for tortilla chips.
Distinctively smooth taste from a blend of avocados, cilantro, lime, onion and green chile peppers.
Made with delicious ingredients. Gluten free, kosher and no preservatives. Safe Handling. Keep refrigerated.
Herdez Guacamole complements chicken, pork, seafood, pasta salads and more. Make it a savory part of breakfast, lunch and dinner meal prep.
Includes 1, 15-ounce tub of Herdez Mild Guacamole. Packaged for freshness and great taste.
product_description: HERDEZ Traditional Guacamole is crafted using quality ingredients that add flavor, heat and the soul of Mexican cuisine to any meal or gathering. Our single cup guacamole follows an authentic Mexican recipe handed down for generations, capturing the bold, flavorful spirit of our culture and traditions on the go!
